hero.title: Let's Get Moving!
hero.subtitle: Your Buddy to Keep You Active
hero.description: Tal3a is the app that helps you find the perfect sports partner, join sports groups in your area, and earn rewards for every activity you do. It's not just about tracking stats; it's about making real friendships!

sports.subtitle: Find the perfect activity for you from our wide range of sports

problemStatement.title: Why Choose Tal3a?
problemStatement.subtitle: We solve the real problems that prevent you from staying active and connected

motivation.title: Lack of Motivation
motivation.description: Many people struggle to stay motivated to exercise regularly. Tal3a provides a supportive community and rewards system to keep you engaged.

organization.title: Difficulty in Organizing
organization.description: Finding and organizing sports activities can be challenging. Tal3a's smart scheduling and location-based features make it easy to join or create events.

isolation.title: Social Isolation
isolation.description: Exercising alone can be less enjoyable. Tal3a connects you with like-minded individuals, fostering friendships and a sense of belonging.

features.title: Latest Activities Around You
features.subtitle: Discover amazing sports activities happening near you

community.title: Tal3a Community

ahmed.name: Ahmed Hassan
ahmed.testimonial: Tal3a changed my life! I found an amazing football group and made lifelong friends. The app makes it so easy to stay active.

fatma.name: Fatma Ali
fatma.testimonial: As someone who loves running, Tal3a helped me find the perfect running partners. The community is so supportive and motivating!

karim.name: Karim Mohamed
karim.testimonial: The rewards system keeps me motivated every day. I've earned so many badges and climbed to the top of the leaderboard!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Tal3a Sports Community

whatIsTal3a.question: What is Tal3a?
whatIsTal3a.answer: Tal3a is a social sports platform that connects athletes and fitness enthusiasts. You can discover sports events, join groups, and build lasting friendships while staying active.

isFree.question: Is Tal3a free to use?
isFree.answer: Yes! Tal3a is completely free to download and use. You can join groups, participate in events, and earn rewards without any cost.

userSafety.question: How does Tal3a ensure user safety?
userSafety.answer: We have strict verification processes, user ratings, and community guidelines. All events are moderated, and we provide safety tips for all activities.

rewards.question: How do the rewards work?
rewards.answer: You earn points by participating in activities, completing challenges, and being active in the community. Points unlock badges, leaderboard positions, and special perks.

availability.question: In which cities is Tal3a available?
availability.answer: Tal3a is currently available in major Egyptian cities including Cairo, Alexandria, Giza, and expanding to more governorates regularly.

contact.question: How can I contact support?
contact.answer: You can reach our support team through the app's help section, email us at support@tal3a.com, or message us on social media.

appDownload.title: Download Tal3a Now
appDownload.subtitle: Get the app and start your fitness journey today
